Cookie Manipulation: Sent the encoded cookies to a pre-defined URL controlled by the attacker.
Command Execution: Identify attribute that can be polluted to spawn a new process or execute a command.
API Endpoint Analysis: Found API endpoint details in the downloaded files
HTML Sanitization: Identified the BeautifulSoup module being used to sanitize HTML.
JavaScript Analysis: Identify the presence of 'news' string in the JavaScript code.
